verses.name: Obadiah 1:17
verses.text: But upon mount Zion shall be deliverance, and there shall be holiness; and the house of Jacob shall possess their possessions.

verses.name: Obadiah 1:18
verses.text: And the house of Jacob shall be a fire, and the house of Joseph a flame, and the house of Esau for stubble, and they shall kindle in them, and devour them; and there shall not be any remaining of the house of Esau; for the Lord hath spoken it.
